Text: Representations for ISDA TransactionDo these look ok Holli Forwarded by Holli KrebsHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Dick D VARNER Dick WEBEugeneORUS AM To cc Bert I DUNN Bert WEBEugeneORUS Subject Representations for ISDA Transaction Attached are drafts of two certificates which I believe will satisfy you needs Please get back to me with any comments ISDA Confirm Representations

Re EWEBis using a guy named Jim DiessenSP at Cable Houston Law Firm I think Christian Yoder knows him They want to pick it back up in light of our two swaps we did yesterday I guess the other option is a long form confirm what do you recommend Holli

EWEB status Cc This deal was binding from day one EWEB did say that they had authority to enter into this transaction and thought they had the necessary approvals from their board therefore putting this language in the confirm is alarming to me maybe the better option may be to switch the deal to physical if there is any issue with the financial Chistian Yoder was okay with their authority to do this physically This deal is deep in the money for us now Forwarded by Holli KrebsHOUECT on PM Sara Shackleton PM To Holli CT cc Tim CT Mark CT Subject EWEB status I spoke with Jim Deason who is reviewing our documentation including the ISDA Schedule Credit Support Annex and Deemed ISDA He will email to me EWEBs comments to our blacklined Schedule He has not conferred with Dick Varner on the Credit Support Annex but hopes to have comments to me later this week I offered to have Tracy or Ed available to discuss credit Finally he has reviewed the Deemed ISDA and will have the same comments here HOWEVER Jim indicated that the transaction which Holli entered into is not the type of FINANCIAL deal that EWEB has contemplated or authorized and that it would require special board approval The Board meets on Dec He requested that a special provision be inserted into the confirm prior to that approval stating that this transaction is NOT BINDING until approved by the EWEB Board Jim will send requested language By copy of this message I ask that Holli advise on steps to be taken regarding execution of the Deemed ISDA confirmation Click on this link to view the document in the Financial Trading Agreements database
Re EWEBsay lets forge ahead and get this deal done I will hold up on future financial trades with them but this deal is of major concern

EWEB status Cc This deal was binding from day one EWEB did say that they had authority to enter into this transaction and thought they had the necessary approvals from their board therefore putting this language in the confirm is alarming to me maybe the better option may be to switch the deal to physical if there is any issue with the financial Chistian Yoder was okay with their authority to do this physically This deal is deep in the money for us now Forwarded by Holli KrebsHOUECT on PM Sara Shackleton PM To Holli CT cc Tim CT Mark CT Subject EWEB status I spoke with Jim Deason who is reviewing our documentation including the ISDA Schedule Credit Support Annex and Deemed ISDA He will email to me EWEBs comments to our blacklined Schedule He has not conferred with Dick Varner on the Credit Support Annex but hopes to have comments to me later this week I offered to have Tracy or Ed available to discuss credit Finally he has reviewed the Deemed ISDA and will have the same comments here HOWEVER Jim indicated that the transaction which Holli entered into is not the type of FINANCIAL deal that EWEB has contemplated or authorized and that it would require special board approval The Board meets on Dec He requested that a special provision be inserted into the confirm prior to that approval stating that this transaction is NOT BINDING until approved by the EWEB Board Jim will send requested language By copy of this message I ask that Holli advise on steps to be taken regarding execution of the Deemed ISDA confirmation Click on this link to view the document in the Financial Trading Agreements database
